wikipedia_page.main:
Richard Ball Spencer (also, incorrectly, Richard Barnett Spencer) was a British marine painter, active from 1840 to 1874.
A son William Ball Spencer (1854-1923) (sometimes, incorrectly known as, Richard Barnett Spencer) also became active as a ship portraitist.

response: # A painting of Queen of Nations by Richard Ball Spencer (1812–1897) and one of an unknown artist are available at Aberdeen Maritime Museum.

William Ball Spencer (sometimes known incorrectly as William Barnett Spencer) (1854-1923) was a British marine painter.Biography of the artist under The Ship Deva, National Maritime Museum. Retrieved 24 September 2021 He was the son of Richard Ball Spencer.Biography of the artist under The Ship Australia, National Maritime Museum. Retrieved 3 March 2017
